All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Account
Used as an intermediary between Database and Controls to store the current username and balance Password cannot be directly accessed.
Controls
Controller for interface.fxml and about.fxml Handles all user keypresses, and passes them to Database when necessary
Database
An ORM to handle queries to the database.
Log
Used to handle calls to log4j.
LoginControls
Controller for the login.fxml file.
Main
The entrypoint to the JavaFX ATM program.
RegisterControls
Controller for the register.fxml file
Root
Bundles stylesheet, and loads FXML into stages to be rendered into a stage
